backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing user-specific notes (CRUD operations) and break reminder functionality with time-based notifications, using Maps for storage and a Queue for notification management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features: Internet Identity login flow, notes CRUD operations, and break reminder functionality with their associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 14 frontend files covering the landing page, React Query hooks, overlay components, panels, content scripts, and build configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space for the companion dog UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the React application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Chrome extension manifest v3 configuration defining permissions, content scripts, web-accessible resources, and metadata for the Companion Dog extension.
frontend/scripts/build-extension.js: Node.js build script that copies manifest, assets, and creates a placeholder content.js, then packages everything into a zip file for extension distribution.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Landing page component with Internet Identity login/logout, extension download functionality, feature descriptions, and installation instructions with warm amber/orange theming.
frontend/src/content/BreakNotification.t: Full-screen modal component displaying a break reminder notification with snooze and dismiss buttons, styled with green/emerald gradient theme.
React component that renders a panel for configuring break reminder intervals (in minutes), saving the setting to backend and localStorage, with error and success feedback.
frontend/src/content/content.tsx: Content script entry point that creates a shadow DOM container, injects styles, and renders the DogOverlay app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/content/DogOverlay.tsx: Main draggable dog companion overlay component that manages state (position, dog animations, messages, panels), handles authentication, displays random encouraging messages, and shows break notifications from the backend.
Renders four circular gradient buttons (Feed, Pet, Notes, Break Reminder) with icons that trigger callback functions passed as props.
frontend/src/content/MessageBubble.tsx: Simple presentational component that displays a message in a styled speech bubble with a tail pointer, positioned above the dog.
frontend/src/content/messages.ts: Exports an array of 20 encouraging messages and a helper function to randomly select one for display.
frontend/src/content/NotesPanel.tsx: Panel component for creating, editing, and deleting notes using backend queries, with inline editing, error handling, and a scrollable list view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor using React Query, switching between authenticated and anonymous actors based on Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on notes (fetch, create, edit, delete) and managing break reminders and notifications through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette using OKLCH color space, font imports (Nunito, Quicksand), and animation utilities for fade-in, slide-in, and zoom effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with custom fonts (Nunito, Quicksand), OKLCH-based color system, border radius variables, and accordion animations using typography and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a browser extension with dog companion overlay featuring encouragement messages, interactions, note-taking, and break reminders, with a known login flow issue.
